info.en: One of the world's oldest living cities, Varanasi is the spiritual capital of India. Located on the banks of the Ganges, it is famous for its mesmerizing evening Ganga Aarti, ancient ghats, and labyrinthine alleys filled with temples. It is believed that dying here offers moksha.
info.hi: विश्व के सबसे पुराने जीवित शहरों में से एक, वाराणसी भारत की आध्यात्मिक राजधानी है। गंगा के तट पर स्थित, यह अपनी मंत्रमुग्ध कर देने वाली शाम की गंगा आरती, प्राचीन घाटों और मंदिरों से भरी भूलभुलैया वाली गलियों के लिए प्रसिद्ध है। यह माना जाता है कि यहां मृत्यु मोक्ष प्रदान करती है।
info.bn: বিশ্বের প্রাচীনতম জীবন্ত শহরগুলির মধ্যে অন্যতম বারাণসী ভারতের আধ্যাত্মিক রাজধানী। গঙ্গা নদীর তীরে অবস্থিত এই শহর তার মন্ত্রমুগ্ধকর সন্ধ্যার গঙ্গা আরতি, প্রাচীন ঘাট এবং মন্দিরে ভরা গলির জন্য বিখ্যাত। বিশ্বাস করা হয় যে এখানে মৃত্যুবরণ করলে মোক্ষ লাভ হয়।

shortDescription: Ancient city on the Ganges where spirituality meets timeless traditions
description: Varanasi, one of the world's oldest continuously inhabited cities, is the spiritual capital of India. Witness the mesmerizing Ganga Aarti, explore ancient ghats at sunrise, and experience the profound energy of this holy city where life and death dance together on the banks of the sacred Ganges.
landscape: River ghats, temples, narrow old-city lanes
seasonNote: Pleasant weather, ideal for ghat walks and boat rides. Avoid summer heat.
keyAttractions: Dashashwamedh Ghat — Famous for evening Ganga Aarti ceremony
Kashi Vishwanath Temple — One of 12 Jyotirlingas, most sacred Shiva temple
Sarnath — Buddhist pilgrimage site where Buddha gave first sermon
Assi Ghat — Peaceful ghat popular with travelers and artists
Manikarnika Ghat — Sacred cremation ghat, center of Hindu afterlife beliefs

itinerary.title: Arrival Day
itinerary.plan: Train: Kolkata → Varanasi (arrive evening). Check into guesthouse near ghats, evening walk.

itinerary.title: Sunrise & Aarti Experience
itinerary.plan: Sunrise boat ride on Ganga + Ghat walk + evening Ganga Aarti at Dashashwamedh Ghat

itinerary.title: Temple & Heritage Day
itinerary.plan: Kashi Vishwanath Temple darshan + explore old city lanes + Vishwanath Gali markets

itinerary.title: Sarnath Excursion
itinerary.plan: Full day trip to Sarnath — Dhamek Stupa, Ashoka Pillar, Archaeological Museum

itinerary.title: Culture & Crafts
itinerary.plan: Heritage walk + Banarasi silk weavers + optional cooking class or music session

itinerary.title: Leisure & Exploration
itinerary.plan: Morning yoga by ghats + Ramnagar Fort + evening photography at ghats

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.plan: Early morning ghat visit + Train: Varanasi → Kolkata

bookingTips: Book train tickets 60 days in advance via IRCTC for confirmed seats
Ganga Aarti is free from ghats; pay only for boat view (shared starts ₹250)
Stay near Assi Ghat for peaceful nights, Dashashwamedh for central location
Hire a local guide for old city lanes — easy to get lost
Try famous Banarasi paan and lassi at Blue Lassi Shop

info.en: A UNESCO World Heritage site, Hampi was the capital of the Vijayanagara Empire in the 14th century. It is a surreal landscape of giant boulders, palm groves, and magnificent ruins of temples, palaces, and market streets.
info.hi: यूनेस्को विश्व धरोहर स्थल, हम्पी 14वीं शताब्दी में विजयनगर साम्राज्य की राजधानी थी। यह विशाल शिलाखंडों, ताड़ के पेड़ों और मंदिरों, महलों और बाजारों के शानदार खंडहरों का एक असली परिदृश्य है। विरुपक्ष मंदिर और विट्ठल मंदिर वास्तुकला के चमत्कार हैं।
info.bn: ইউনেস্কো ওয়ার্ল্ড হেরিটেজ সাইট হাম্পি ১৪শ শতাব্দীতে বিজয়নগর সাম্রাজ্যের রাজধানী ছিল। এটি বিশাল সব পাথর, পাম গাছ এবং মন্দির, রাজপ্রাসাদ ও বাজারের ধ্বংসাবশেষের এক অদ্ভুত সুন্দর দৃশ্যপট। বিরুপাক্ষ মন্দির এবং বিঠল মন্দিরের স্থাপত্যশৈলী বিস্ময়কর।

shortDescription: UNESCO World Heritage ruins amidst surreal boulder-strewn landscape
description: Hampi, the ruined capital of the Vijayanagara Empire, is a photographer's paradise. Massive boulders, ancient temples, and intricate carvings create an otherworldly landscape. Explore on a rented bicycle, climb Matanga Hill for sunrise, and feel the grandeur of a once-magnificent kingdom.
landscape: Boulder-strewn rocky hills, UNESCO ruins, temples, river islands
seasonNote: Cool and pleasant weather. Summers (March–May) extremely hot. Monsoons have occasional access issues.
keyAttractions: Virupaksha Temple — Active temple, Hampi's spiritual heart since 7th century
Vittala Temple Complex — Famous stone chariot and musical pillars
Matanga Hill — Best sunrise/sunset viewpoint over entire Hampi
Elephant Stables — Royal elephant housing with Indo-Islamic architecture
Hippie Island (Virupapur Gaddi) — Laid-back area across the river

itinerary.title: Travel Day
itinerary.plan: Train: Kolkata → Hospet (or fly to Hubli + bus). Arrive evening, rest.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Sunset
itinerary.plan: Settle in Hampi Bazaar + explore Virupaksha Temple + sunset at Hemakuta Hill

itinerary.title: Ruins Exploration
itinerary.plan: Full day: Vittala Temple, stone chariot, royal enclosure, elephant stables — bike/scooter

itinerary.title: Hills & River
itinerary.plan: Matanga Hill sunrise + Achyutaraya Temple + coracle ride across river

itinerary.title: Hippie Island
itinerary.plan: Cross to Virupapur Gaddi + paddy field walks + bouldering + riverside cafés

itinerary.title: Slow Day
itinerary.plan: Anegundi village heritage + Durga Temple + sunset photography

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.plan: Morning temple visit + Train: Hospet → Kolkata

bookingTips: Book train early; alternative: Fly to Hubli/Bengaluru + bus to Hampi
Rent bicycle (₹100/day) or scooter (₹400/day) — best way to explore
Stay in Hampi Bazaar for ruins access or Hippie Island for vibe
Carry water and sunscreen — ruins area has little shade
Visit Mango Tree restaurant for riverside meals

info.en: The most holy place for Buddhists, this is where Prince Siddhartha attained enlightenment beneath the Bodhi Tree to become the Buddha. The Mahabodhi Temple Complex is a UNESCO World Heritage site and a center of pilgrimage.
info.hi: बौद्धों के लिए सबसे पवित्र स्थान, यही वह जगह है जहां राजकुमार सिद्धार्थ ने बोधि वृक्ष के नीचे ज्ञान प्राप्त किया और बुद्ध बने। महाबोधि मंदिर परिसर एक यूनेस्को विश्व धरोहर स्थल है और दुनिया भर के बौद्धों के लिए तीर्थस्थल का केंद्र है।
info.bn: বৌদ্ধদের জন্য সবচেয়ে পবিত্র স্থান, এখানেই রাজকুমার সিদ্ধার্থ বোধি গাছের নিচে কঠোর ধ্যানের মাধ্যমে বুদ্ধত্ব লাভ করেছিলেন। মহাবোধি মন্দির চত্বর একটি ইউনেস্কো বিশ্ব ঐতিহ্যবাহী স্থান এবং সারা বিশ্বের বৌদ্ধদের জন্য একটি প্রধান তীর্থস্থান।

shortDescription: Sacred Buddhist pilgrimage site and center of spiritual awakening
description: Bodh Gaya is where Siddhartha Gautama attained enlightenment under the Bodhi Tree 2,500 years ago. The serene Mahabodhi Temple, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, draws pilgrims and seekers from across the world. Experience profound peace at international monasteries representing Buddhist traditions from Thailand, Japan, Tibet, and beyond.
landscape: Spiritual town, Buddhist pilgrimage site, calm environment
seasonNote: Pleasant winter weather. Summers very hot. Buddha Purnima (May) is special but crowded.
keyAttractions: Mahabodhi Temple — UNESCO site, exact spot of Buddha's enlightenment
Bodhi Tree — Sacred descendant of the original tree
Great Buddha Statue — 80-feet tall, largest Buddha statue in India
International Monasteries — Thai, Japanese, Tibetan, Chinese, Bhutanese temples
Rajgir & Nalanda — Ancient Buddhist university ruins (day trip)

itinerary.title: Travel Day
itinerary.plan: Train: Kolkata → Gaya. Auto to Bodh Gaya (16 km). Evening walk around temple.

itinerary.title: Temple Immersion
itinerary.plan: Mahabodhi Temple complex + meditation under Bodhi Tree + evening prayers

itinerary.title: Monastery Hopping
itinerary.plan: Visit Thai, Japanese, Tibetan, Chinese monasteries + Great Buddha Statue

itinerary.title: Rajgir & Nalanda
itinerary.plan: Day trip — Nalanda University ruins, Rajgir hot springs, Griddhakuta Peak

itinerary.title: Buddha's Path
itinerary.plan: Sujata Kuti + Dungeshwari Cave (where Buddha meditated) + Archaeological Museum

itinerary.title: Meditation & Culture
itinerary.plan: Morning meditation session + local markets + Muchalinda Lake + evening temple

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.plan: Early morning Bodhi Tree visit + Train: Gaya → Kolkata

bookingTips: Many monasteries offer accommodation at very low rates — book directly
Visit Mahabodhi Temple early morning for peaceful meditation
Carry light cotton clothes and comfortable walking shoes
Thai and Japanese monasteries have beautiful architecture worth visiting
Combine with Varanasi (3 hours away) for a spiritual circuit

info.en: Located on the banks of the Saryu River, Ayodhya is believed to be the birthplace of Lord Rama. It is one of the seven holiest cities in Hinduism and has recently seen a massive transformation with the construction of the Ram Mandir.
info.hi: सरयू नदी के तट पर स्थित, अयोध्या को भगवान राम का जन्मस्थान माना जाता है। यह हिंदू धर्म के सात सबसे पवित्र शहरों (सप्त पुरी) में से एक है और हाल ही में राम मंदिर के निर्माण के साथ यहां भारी बदलाव देखा गया है।
info.bn: সরযূ নদীর তীরে অবস্থিত অযোধ্যাকে ভগবান রামের জন্মস্থান বলে মনে করা হয়। এটি হিন্দু ধর্মের সাতটি পবিত্রতম শহরের (সপ্ত পুরী) একটি এবং সম্প্রতি রাম মন্দির নির্মাণের ফলে এখানে ব্যাপক পরিবর্তন এসেছে।

shortDescription: Sacred city on the Saryu River, home to the grand Ram Mandir
description: Ayodhya, believed to be the birthplace of Lord Rama, is one of Hinduism's seven sacred cities. The magnificent Ram Mandir, along with ancient temples and the serene Saryu River ghats, creates a deeply spiritual atmosphere. Experience evening aartis, explore heritage lanes, and witness the living traditions of Ramayana.
landscape: Heritage town, Ram Janmabhoomi, Saryu river ghats
seasonNote: Pleasant weather for temple visits. Diwali and Ram Navami are special but very crowded.
keyAttractions: Ram Mandir — Grand temple at Ram Janmabhoomi, architectural marvel
Hanuman Garhi — 10th century temple on hilltop, city views
Saryu River Ghats — Ram Ki Paidi, evening aarti, boat rides
Kanak Bhawan — Beautiful palace-temple dedicated to Sita-Ram
Nageshwarnath Temple — Ancient Shiva temple built by Kush

itinerary.title: Travel Day
itinerary.plan: Train: Kolkata → Ayodhya. Arrive evening, check into dharamshala/hotel.

itinerary.title: Ram Mandir Darshan
itinerary.plan: Early morning Ram Mandir darshan + Saryu Ghat evening aarti

itinerary.title: Temple Circuit
itinerary.plan: Hanuman Garhi + Kanak Bhawan + Nageshwarnath Temple + local markets

itinerary.title: Ghats & River
itinerary.plan: Saryu river boat ride + Guptar Ghat + Treta Ke Thakur temple

itinerary.title: Excursion Day
itinerary.plan: Day trip to Naimisharanya (85 km) — sacred forest, 88 temples site

itinerary.title: Heritage Walk
itinerary.plan: Ram Ki Paidi + heritage walk through old Ayodhya + craft shopping

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.plan: Morning temple visit + Train: Ayodhya → Kolkata

bookingTips: Book Ram Mandir darshan slots online during peak season
Dharamshalas near temples offer very affordable stays
Avoid major festival days (Ram Navami, Diwali) for smaller crowds
Carry modest clothing — many temples have dress codes
E-rickshaws are the best way to navigate the temple circuit

info.en: The largest mangrove forest in the world and a UNESCO World Heritage site, famous for the Royal Bengal Tiger. It is a unique ecosystem where tigers are known to swim in saline water.
info.hi: दुनिया का सबसे बड़ा मैंग्रोव जंगल और यूनेस्को विश्व धरोहर स्थल, जो रॉयल बंगाल टाइगर के लिए प्रसिद्ध है। यह एक अनूठा पारिस्थितिकी तंत्र है जहां बाघ खारे पानी में तैरने के लिए जाने जाते हैं।
info.bn: বিশ্বের বৃহত্তম ম্যানগ্রোভ বন এবং ইউনেস্কো ওয়ার্ল্ড হেরিটেজ সাইট, যা রয়্যাল বেঙ্গল টাইগারের জন্য বিখ্যাত। এটি একটি অনন্য ইকোসিস্টেম যেখানে বাঘেরা নোনা জলে সাঁতার কাটার জন্য পরিচিত। এখানকার নদীপথের জটাজাল বন্যপ্রাণী প্রেমীদের জন্য রোমাঞ্চকর।

shortDescription: World's largest mangrove forest, home to the Royal Bengal Tiger
description: The Sundarbans, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is the world's largest tidal mangrove forest and the only mangrove habitat of tigers. Navigate through mysterious waterways, spot crocodiles and exotic birds, and experience life in fishing villages. The forest's ethereal beauty and wilderness create an unforgettable adventure.
landscape: Mangrove forest, river delta, Royal Bengal Tigers
permits: Forest entry permit required (usually included in tour packages)
seasonNote: Dry season with best wildlife sightings. Avoid monsoon (June–September) due to heavy rains.
keyAttractions: Sajnekhali Tiger Reserve — Watchtower, bird sanctuary, crocodile enclosure
Sudhanyakhali Watchtower — Prime tiger and deer spotting area
Dobanki Watchtower — Famous canopy walk through mangroves
Netidhopani — 400-year-old temple ruins in the forest
Pakhiralay — Bird island with migratory species

itinerary.title: Travel Day
itinerary.plan: Kolkata → Godkhali (3 hours) → Boat to eco-lodge. Evening nature walk.

itinerary.title: Tiger Reserve
itinerary.plan: Sajnekhali Tiger Reserve + watchtower + bird sanctuary + crocodile pond

itinerary.title: Deep Forest Safari
itinerary.plan: Sudhanyakhali watchtower + deep forest boat safari through narrow creeks

itinerary.title: Canopy Walk
itinerary.plan: Dobanki watchtower (canopy walk) + Netidhopani temple ruins + wildlife spotting

itinerary.title: Village Life
itinerary.plan: Local fishing village visit + honey collector community + handicrafts + fish market

itinerary.title: Bird Watching
itinerary.plan: Pakhiralay (bird island) + mangrove exploration + sunset cruise

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.plan: Morning boat ride + return boat to Godkhali → Kolkata

bookingTips: Book tour packages from Kolkata for hassle-free experience
2N/3D packages start ~₹4,500; 3N/4D from ₹6,500 per person
Carry binoculars for wildlife spotting — essential
Pack insect repellent, sunscreen, and light clothes
Tiger sightings are rare but deer, crocodiles, birds are common

tagline: Sacred Shores of the Bay of Bengal

info.en: One of the Char Dham pilgrimage sites for Hindus, famous for the Jagannath Temple and its annual Rath Yatra. It also boasts golden beaches on the Bay of Bengal, making it a popular spiritual and leisure destination.
info.hi: हिंदुओं के चार धाम तीर्थ स्थलों में से एक, जगन्नाथ मंदिर और इसकी वार्षिक रथ यात्रा के लिए प्रसिद्ध है। यह बंगाल की खाड़ी के सुनहरे समुद्र तटों का भी दावा करता है, जो इसे एक लोकप्रिय आध्यात्मिक और अवकाश गंतव्य बनाता है।
info.bn: হিন্দুদের চার ধাম তীর্থস্থানের অন্যতম পুরী তার জগন্নাথ মন্দির এবং বার্ষিক রথযাত্রার জন্য বিখ্যাত। বঙ্গোপসাগরের বুকে থাকা এর সোনালী সৈকত এটিকে একটি জনপ্রিয় পর্যটন এবং আধ্যাত্মিক গন্তব্যে পরিণত করেছে।

shortDescription: Legendary Jagannath Temple town with golden beaches and rich culture
description: Puri, one of the four sacred Char Dhams, blends spirituality with seaside relaxation. The ancient Jagannath Temple, famous for the Rath Yatra, stands as one of India's most revered pilgrimage sites. Combine temple darshan with beach sunrises, day trips to the magnificent Konark Sun Temple, and experiences of Odisha's rich art traditions.
landscape: Beach town, Jagannath Temple, coastal Odisha
seasonNote: Pleasant beach weather. Rath Yatra (June/July) is spectacular but extremely crowded.
keyAttractions: Jagannath Temple — One of Char Dham, 12th century masterpiece
Puri Beach — Golden sand, sunrise views, fishing boats
Konark Sun Temple — UNESCO site, 13th century chariot-shaped marvel
Chilika Lake — Asia's largest brackish water lagoon, dolphins
Raghurajpur — Traditional Pattachitra painting village

itinerary.title: Travel Day
itinerary.plan: Train: Kolkata → Puri. Evening beach walk + seafood dinner.

itinerary.title: Temple & Beach
itinerary.plan: Early morning Jagannath Temple darshan + Puri beach + evening at sea face

itinerary.title: Konark Excursion
itinerary.plan: Day trip to Konark Sun Temple (35 km) + Chandrabhaga Beach + ASI museum

itinerary.title: Chilika Lake
itinerary.plan: Chilika Lake boat ride + Kalijai Temple + dolphin spotting + Nalabana Bird Sanctuary

itinerary.title: Art Villages
itinerary.plan: Raghurajpur artist village + Pipili appliqué craft village + Pattachitra workshop

itinerary.title: Beach Day
itinerary.plan: Beach relaxation + Gundicha Temple + Sudarshan Crafts Museum + sunset

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.plan: Morning beach walk + Train: Puri → Kolkata

bookingTips: Book Howrah-Puri Express early — very popular route
Sea-facing hotels cost more but worth the sunrise views
Jagannath Temple open only to Hindus — carry ID if asked
Visit Konark early morning to avoid heat and crowds
Buy Pattachitra paintings directly from Raghurajpur artists

info.en: A temple town that doubles as a laid-back beach destination. Ancient mythology says Ravana dropped a shiva linga here. Unlike Goa, its beaches like Om Beach and Kudle Beach offer a more tranquil, rustic vibe.
info.hi: एक मंदिर का शहर जो एक शांत समुद्र तट गंतव्य के रूप में भी जाना जाता है। प्राचीन पौराणिक कथाओं का कहना है कि रावण ने यहां एक शिव लिंग (आत्म लिंग) गिराया था। गोवा के विपरीत, ओम बीच और कुडले बीच जैसे इसके समुद्र तट अधिक शांत और देहाती अनुभव प्रदान करते हैं।
info.bn: একটি মন্দির শহর যা একই সাথে একটি শান্ত সমুদ্র সৈকত গন্তব্য। পৌরাণিক কাহিনী অনুসারে রাবণ এখানে শিব লিঙ্গ (আত্মলিঙ্গ) ফেলে দিয়েছিলেন। গোয়ার মতো না হলেও, ওম বিচ এবং কুদলে বিচের মতো এখানকার সৈকতগুলি অনেক বেশি শান্ত এবং গ্রাম্য পরিবেশ উপহার দেয়।

shortDescription: Pristine beaches meeting ancient temples in laid-back paradise
description: Gokarna offers the perfect blend of beach bliss and spiritual energy. Unlike crowded Goa, these pristine beaches — Om, Kudle, Paradise — remain relatively untouched. Trek between beaches, practice yoga by the sea, visit the ancient Mahabaleshwar Temple, and enjoy the relaxed café culture that draws travelers seeking peace.
landscape: Coastal hills, pristine beaches, temple town
seasonNote: Dry season with calm seas. Monsoon (June–September) beaches may be rough. Maha Shivaratri special.
keyAttractions: Om Beach — Famous Om-shaped beach, cafés, water sports
Kudle Beach — Backpacker favorite, stunning sunset views
Paradise Beach — Secluded, boat access or trek only
Mahabaleshwar Temple — Ancient Shiva temple, Gokarna's spiritual heart
Half Moon Beach — Hidden gem between Om and Paradise

itinerary.title: Travel Day
itinerary.plan: Train: Kolkata → Gokarna Road (or fly Goa + bus). Arrive evening, settle at beach shack.

itinerary.title: Om Beach Day
itinerary.plan: Explore Om Beach + beachside breakfast + sunset + café dinner

itinerary.title: Beach Trek
itinerary.plan: Trek from Kudle Beach → Om Beach → Half Moon Beach → Paradise Beach

itinerary.title: Water Adventure
itinerary.plan: Kayaking/snorkeling at Om Beach (optional) + beach relaxation + bonfires

itinerary.title: Temple Town
itinerary.plan: Mahabaleshwar Temple + Gokarna Beach + town exploration + markets

itinerary.title: Excursion Day
itinerary.plan: Day trip to Mirjan Fort + Yana Caves (optional) + evening at Kudle Beach

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.plan: Sunrise yoga + beach farewell + Train: Gokarna Road → Kolkata

bookingTips: Beach shacks/huts offer authentic experience and best budget stays
Trek between beaches to save on boat costs and enjoy the views
Konkan Railway route is stunning — book window seat
Namaste Café at Om Beach is legendary for food and sunset views
Carry flashlight for night treks between beaches

info.en: Established by Nobel laureate Rabindranath Tagore, this university town is a UNESCO World Heritage site. It is famous for its open-air classrooms, the Poush Mela festival, and a unique culture that celebrates art and nature.
info.hi: नोबेल पुरस्कार विजेता रवींद्रनाथ टैगोर द्वारा स्थापित, यह विश्वविद्यालय शहर एक यूनेस्को विश्व धरोहर स्थल है। यह अपनी खुली कक्षाओं, पौष मेला उत्सव और कला, संगीत और प्रकृति का जश्न मनाने वाली एक अनूठी संस्कृति के लिए प्रसिद्ध है।
info.bn: নোবেল বিজয়ী রবীন্দ্রনাথ ঠাকুর প্রতিষ্ঠিত এই বিশ্ববিদ্যালয় শহরটি একটি ইউনেস্কো হেরিটেজ সাইট। এটি তার খোলা আকাশের নিচের শ্রেণীকক্ষ, পৌষ মেলা এবং এমন এক অনন্য সংস্কৃতির জন্য বিখ্যাত যা শিল্প, সঙ্গীত এবং প্রকৃতিকে উদযাপন করে।

shortDescription: Cultural haven where art, nature, and Tagore's legacy come alive
description: Shantiniketan, founded by Rabindranath Tagore, is Bengal's cultural heart. This university town celebrates art, music, and open-air education. Cycle through rural landscapes, experience Baul music under sal trees, shop for tribal crafts at Sonajhuri haat, and immerse yourself in the creative spirit that Tagore envisioned.
landscape: Cultural town, Tagore's university, rural Bengal
seasonNote: Pleasant weather. Poush Mela (December) and Basanta Utsav (March/Holi) are must-visit festivals.
keyAttractions: Visva-Bharati University — Tagore's open-air school, unique architecture
Uttarayan — Tagore's residence, now museum with personal artifacts
Kala Bhavana — Art college with stunning murals and sculptures
Sonajhuri — Saturday handicraft haat (market) under sal trees
Amar Kutir — Handloom and handicraft cooperative

itinerary.title: Travel Day
itinerary.plan: Train: Kolkata → Bolpur (2.5 hours). Auto to guesthouse. Evening walk.

itinerary.title: Tagore Heritage
itinerary.plan: Uttarayan (Tagore museum) + Kala Bhavana art gallery + campus walk

itinerary.title: Crafts & Forest
itinerary.plan: Amar Kutir handicrafts + Sonajhuri forest walk + Saturday haat (if Saturday)

itinerary.title: Day Trip
itinerary.plan: Kenduli mela site / Bakreswar hot springs + pottery villages

itinerary.title: Village Cycling
itinerary.plan: Cycle through villages + Khoai red soil terrain + Ballavpur Wildlife Sanctuary

itinerary.title: Culture & Music
itinerary.plan: Kopai river bank + evening Baul music performance + local crafts shopping

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.plan: Morning university grounds + Train: Bolpur → Kolkata

bookingTips: Visit during Poush Mela (December) or Basanta Utsav (March) for festivals
Book guesthouses near university campus for easy access
Bicycle is the best way to explore — rent from town center
Saturday Sonajhuri haat is must-visit for authentic tribal crafts
Try shorshe ilish (hilsa in mustard) and local Bengali sweets

info.en: A seaside resort village famous for having the longest drivable beach in India (13 km). Mandarmani offers red crabs crawling on the sand and a more luxurious, serene beach experience with high-end resorts.
info.hi: एक समुद्र तटीय रिसॉर्ट गांव जो भारत में सबसे लंबे समय तक चलने योग्य समुद्र तट (13 किमी) के लिए प्रसिद्ध है। मंदारमणी रेत पर रेंगते हुए लाल केकड़ों और उच्च अंत रिसॉर्ट्स के साथ अधिक शानदार, शांत समुद्र तट का अनुभव प्रदान करता है।
info.bn: ভারতের দীর্ঘতম ড্রাইভযোগ্য সৈকতের (১৩ কিমি) জন্য বিখ্যাত একটি জনপ্রিয় সমুদ্রতট। দিঘার ভিড় থেকে আলাদা, মন্দারমনি লাল কাঁকড়া আর বিলাসবহুল রিসর্টের জন্য পরিচিত, যা এক নিরিবিলি এবং আরামদায়ক সমুদ্র ভ্রমণের অভিজ্ঞতা দেয়।

shortDescription: Longest drivable beach in India with red crabs and peaceful vibes
description: Mandarmani offers 13 kilometers of uninterrupted golden beach — the longest motorable beach in India. Watch thousands of red crabs during low tide, enjoy ATV rides on the sand, and escape the crowds of Digha. This quiet coastal getaway is perfect for those seeking beach relaxation without the tourist rush.
landscape: Long quiet beach, red crabs, weekend getaway
seasonNote: Dry season with pleasant beach weather. Avoid monsoon for swimming. Weekdays less crowded.
keyAttractions: 13 km Beach Stretch — Longest drivable beach in Bengal, golden sands
Red Crabs — Unique phenomenon during low tide
Tajpur Beach — Quieter alternative nearby, fishing village vibes
Shankarpur — Traditional fishing village, fresh catch market
Digha — Popular beach town nearby for day trip

itinerary.title: Travel Day
itinerary.plan: Kolkata → Mandarmani (4-5 hours by car/bus). Evening beach walk + sunset.

itinerary.title: Beach Morning
itinerary.plan: Sunrise beach walk + red crab spotting + ATV ride on beach

itinerary.title: Digha Trip
itinerary.plan: Day trip to Digha + Udaipur Beach + Chandaneswar Temple + New Digha

itinerary.title: Tajpur Excursion
itinerary.plan: Tajpur (nearby quiet beach) + kayaking/boat ride + sunset

itinerary.title: Beach Leisure
itinerary.plan: Beach relaxation + seafood lunch + sunset photography + evening bonfire

itinerary.title: Fishing Village
itinerary.plan: Shankarpur fishing village + fresh catch market + local life + beach evening

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.plan: Morning beach walk + Mandarmani → Kolkata

bookingTips: Weekend rates higher — visit weekdays for better deals
Beachfront resorts cost more but offer direct beach access
Red crabs best seen early morning during low tide
Carry sunscreen and beach essentials — limited shops
Fresh pomfret and prawn at local shacks are must-try

tagline: City of Mahakal and Eternal Faith

info.en: An ancient city situated on the banks of the Shipra River, Ujjain is home to the Mahakaleshwar Jyotirlinga. It is also one of the four sites for the massive Kumbh Mela held every 12 years.
info.hi: शिप्रा नदी के तट पर स्थित एक प्राचीन शहर, उज्जैन महाकालेश्वर ज्योतिर्लिंग का घर है। यह हर 12 साल में आयोजित होने वाले विशाल कुंभ मेले के चार स्थलों में से एक है और हिंदू भूगोलवेत्ताओं के लिए एक प्रमुख मध्याह्न रेखा थी।
info.bn: শিপ্রা নদীর তীরে অবস্থিত প্রাচীন শহর উজ্জয়িনী মহাকালেশ্বর জ্যোতির্লিঙ্গের জন্য বিখ্যাত। এটি কুম্ভ মেলার চারটি স্থানের একটি এবং হিন্দু জ্যোতির্বিদ্যার ইতিহাসে এর বিশেষ গুরুত্ব রয়েছে।

shortDescription: One of seven sacred cities, home to the famous Mahakaleshwar Jyotirlinga
description: Ujjain, one of Hinduism's seven sacred cities, is home to the Mahakaleshwar Jyotirlinga — one of twelve revered Shiva lingams. Experience the mystical Bhasma Aarti at dawn, explore the ancient Shipra River ghats, and feel the spiritual energy of a city that has been a center of learning and faith for millennia.
landscape: Temple town, Shipra river, Mahakaleshwar Jyotirlinga
seasonNote: Pleasant weather for temple visits. Simhastha Kumbh (every 12 years) is grand but very crowded.
keyAttractions: Mahakaleshwar Temple — One of 12 Jyotirlingas, famous Bhasma Aarti
Ram Ghat — Sacred ghat on Shipra river, evening aarti
Kal Bhairav Temple — Unique temple where liquor is offered to deity
Ved Shala (Jantar Mantar) — 18th century astronomical observatory
Omkareshwar — Another Jyotirlinga, day trip (140 km)

itinerary.title: Travel Day
itinerary.plan: Train: Kolkata → Ujjain. Arrive evening, rest for early morning aarti.

itinerary.title: Bhasma Aarti
itinerary.plan: Pre-dawn Mahakaleshwar Temple Bhasma Aarti (pre-book) + rest + Ram Ghat evening

itinerary.title: Temple Circuit
itinerary.plan: Kal Bhairav Temple + Harsiddhi Temple + Gopal Mandir + Ved Shala observatory

itinerary.title: Omkareshwar Trip
itinerary.plan: Day trip to Omkareshwar Jyotirlinga (140 km) — temple, Narmada views, return evening

itinerary.title: River & Heritage
itinerary.plan: Shipra river boat ride + Sandipani Ashram (Krishna's school) + Chintaman Ganesh

itinerary.title: Culture Day
itinerary.plan: ISKCON temple + Bhartrihari Caves + local markets + evening aarti at Ram Ghat

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.plan: Morning temple darshan + Train: Ujjain → Kolkata

bookingTips: Book Bhasma Aarti online 1-2 weeks in advance — limited daily slots
Dharamshalas near Mahakaleshwar offer very affordable stays
Omkareshwar trip needs full day — start early
Kal Bhairav temple is unique experience — don't miss it
Carry modest clothing for all temple visits
